careerBackground: I graduated from the University of Westminster in Computer Science and, after a year working in support, I took a year out freelancing building websites mostly in WordPress developing the full stack from design all the way to PHP and MySQL. Since then, in the last four years I've found my spiritual home working in the front-end for a range of clients bringing designs to life and providing JavaScript logic to build rich interfaces for web pages and web apps.
superHeroPower: The power of inception - so I could instantly plant my marvellous ideas into the minds of others.
